description: This file defines configuration classes for different environments (development, production, testing) for the TicTacToe API, including environment variable handling, security, database, CORS, logging, and app initialization.

classes.name: BaseConfig
classes.description: Base configuration class with common settings for the TicTacToe API.

classes.name: DevelopmentConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for development environment, inherits from BaseConfig.

classes.name: ProductionConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for production environment, inherits from BaseConfig.

classes.name: TestingConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for testing environment, inherits from BaseConfig.

methods.name: get_env_var
methods.description: Retrieves environment variables with optional type conversion and default value.

methods.name: init_app
methods.description: Initializes Flask app with configuration settings, creates necessary directories, and validates configuration.

methods.name: validate_config
methods.description: Validates essential configuration settings for the Flask app.
